snippet: Facing an impeachment effort, Gov. Paul LePage said that he would skip the traditional State of the State speech to a joint session of the Legislature.
lead_paragraph: Facing an impeachment effort, Gov. Paul LePage said that he would skip the traditional State of the State speech to a joint session of the Legislature.

headline.main: Maine: Governor Will Skip Delivery of State of the State Address
headline.print_headline: Maine: Governor Will Skip Delivery of State of the State Address
